content.main: We have different solutions for your idea!
content.card1Text: Reach many more visitors with a website optimized for selling.
content.card2Text: Make your customers find you on the world's most used search engine.
content.card3Text: Your website, ready for mobiles, PCs, notebooks, and tablets.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitles: These are some of the plans we offer
services.subtitles2: (The price of the services includes 12 months, for a longer period consult quotation)

card1.title: One Page
card1.content: One page concentrates all the information on a single page. Visitors can scroll down in a continuous flow to learn about your business. Although it's more concise and direct, it's sometimes ideal for presenting an idea or product in a captivating and effective way, especially on mobile devices where simplicity is key.

button.value: Hola, quiero consultar por una web One Page

card2.title: Institutional
card2.content: The institutional page offers a comprehensive presentation of your business, allowing for multiple sections to explore different aspects of your company. Visitors can navigate through various sections to gain a complete understanding of your business. This option is ideal for conveying information in an organized and thorough manner, tailored to the specific needs of your company.

button.value: Hola, quiero consultar por una web Institucional

card3.title: Online Store
card3.content: If you want to sell products online, you need an e-commerce page. It's like having a virtual store open 24 hours a day. From mobile devices, your customers can browse your catalog and make secure purchases. It's an efficient and convenient way to expand your business into the digital world.

button.value: Hola, quiero consultar por una Tienda Online
